ygData.subject: Re: Taxis
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve never heard the term, but I would suspect either (a) Druids, or (b) Wizards. Because either one can take you to the far ends of Norrath with little
ygData.messageBody:
I've never heard the term, but I would suspect
either (a) Druids, or (b) Wizards. Because either one
can take you to the far ends of Norrath with little
problem. Like the Druid who cast levitate, invis, and SoW
on us to take us safely through Dagnor's Cauldron.
Goblins? What Goblins? And this was at 14th level -- later
they can teleport between those Druid-Ring things.
Wizards, too. Don't both get Group Gate
eventually?<br><br>Kharlisht of Kaladim, waiting for war<br>13th season
rogue<br>Drinal
